message: It' is in a very early stage at the moment, but i only started it today
I started on a convore reader vim plugin - https://github.com/dekomote/convore.vim
Testing the plugin. This is writen using it. It now supports groups and topics creation and writing messages.
Great work! This message writen from your plugin!
excellent idea.  irc -> convore -> vim = irc+ ;)
damn. now I need to compile my vim with python support again.
you need to pass "pasted=true" as an argument to use monospaced font
re-compiled vim, loaded the script, BOOM!, awesome (:
i will try to make code pasting work.
Guys, lets see some issues/requests etc :)

import vim
rng_start = int(vim.eval('a:line1')) - 1
rng_end = int(vim.eval('a:line2'))
if int(vim.eval('a:count')):
    code = '
'.join(vim.current.buffer[rng_start:rng_end])
else:
    code = '
'.join(vim.current.buffer)
